text: BAFTA is the British Academy of Film and Television Arts. BAFTA may also refer to: * British Academy Film Awards or BAFTA Film Awards, presented in an annual award show * British Academy Television Awards or BAFTA TV Awards, presented in an annual award show * Baltic Free Trade Area, a 1994–2004 free trade agreement between Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania * Bafta cloth, a plain weave textile originally made in India ==See also== * BAFTA Cymru, the Welsh branch of the British Academy of Film and Television Arts * BAFTA Scotland, the Scottish branch of the British Academy of Film and Television Arts
title: BAFTA (disambiguation)
